problem_definition.command_line: rm -f fldecomp.log; make clean-run; fldecomp -i triangle -n 4 -v cube > fldecomp.log

variables.variable: import fluidity.diagnostics.triangletools as triangletools partitions = [] for i in range(4): partitions.append(triangletools.ReadTriangle("cube_" + str(i)))

pass_tests.test: import fluidity_tools nodeCounts = [] for partition in partitions: nodeCounts.append(partition.NodeCoordsCount()) fluidity_tools.compare_variables([float(nodeCount) for nodeCount in nodeCounts[1:]], [float(nodeCounts[0]) for i in range(len(nodeCounts) - 1)], 0.15)
